means: （与某人）搏斗( wrestle的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: The book also wrestles with the idea of individualism.
sentence.Network_cn: 书中也与个人英雄主义的观念进行搏斗.

sentence.Network_en: He that wrestles with us strengthens our nerves and sharpens our skill.
sentence.Network_cn: 和我们搏斗的人锻炼了我们的勇气,磨练了我们的技能.

sentence.Network_en: My loathing wrestles with the slow twilights.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的恨意与缓慢的黄昏争着.

list.abs: 职业摔角(Professional wrestling)是一种以摔跤比赛为基础的表演节目，比赛在限定的规则下进行以娱乐为目的的表演。 早期的职业摔 …
《搞基摔跤（Wrestle Jump）》很搞笑的一款小游戏，两个基友扭打在一起，通过不停的摁键来蹬腿，让对方头撞在地上或墙上你就 …
仁爱初一英语词组和作文_百度知道 ... snatch 抓举 freestyle wrestling 自由式摔跤 Men's Keirin 林赛.
Chang3 | Chinese Dictionary ... 饲养场 farm;feed lot;dry lot 角斗场 wrestling ring 敞亮 bright and spacious.

entry.tran: 试图解决;绞尽脑汁处理
entry.def: When you wrestle with a difficult problem, you try to deal with it.

example.ex: Delegates wrestled with the problems of violence and sanctions...
example.tran: 代表们试图解决暴力与惩处的问题。
我们在全力应付经济衰退问题。

entry.def: If you wrestle with someone, you fight them by forcing them into painful positions or throwing them to the ground, rather than by hitting them. Some people wrestle as a sport.

example.ex: The bridesmaids and pageboys squealed and wrestled with each other in the garden.
example.tran: 伴娘和伴童在花园里尖叫着，扭打在一起。

entry.def: If you wrestle a person or thing somewhere, you move them there using a lot of force, for example by twisting a part of someone's body into a painful position.

example.ex: We had to physically wrestle the child from the man's arms...
example.tran: 我们只得用力把孩子从那个男子手中夺过来。

example.ex: The stationmaster pounced and wrestled the gun from him...
example.tran: 站长猛扑过去，奋力夺下他手中的枪。

auth_sentence.content: Mrs. Kammerer wrestles with when to take responsibilities away from her husband.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mrs. Kammerer wrestles with when to take responsibilities away from her husband.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mrs. Kammerer wrestles with when to take responsibilities away from her husband.

auth_sentence.content: He wrestles the lady-goggles off his face and thrusts them at me.
auth_sentence.res_content: He wrestles the lady-goggles off his face and thrusts them at me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He wrestles the lady-goggles off his face and thrusts them at me.

auth_sentence.content: I am an adult gay man who wrestles with his attration to pubescent and post-pubescent boys.
